Control Name: 5.3.2 Framework and library updates are included into the workload lifecycle.
Control Statement: Application frameworks are frequently provided with updates (e.g. security), released by the vendor or communities. Critical and important security patches need to be prioritized.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.3 What practices and tools have you implemented as part of the development cycle?
control_attributes.Control: 5.3.2 Framework and library updates are included into the workload lifecycle.
control_attributes.Description: Application frameworks are frequently provided with updates (e.g. security), released by the vendor or communities. Critical and important security patches need to be prioritized.
